root.text: Additive Manufacturing (AM), or popularly known today as 3D printing, is a technology which is used to manufacture prototype parts by printing them layer by layer. AM has evolved from just manufacturing prototypes into a process that manufactures high quality end parts at a faster rate. It is a fast-emerging field and expected to develop even more and take the lead in manufacturing techniques in the near future.
In this workshop, prototyping of products will be discussed with advanced technologies such as,
and combining with contemplating experience in state of the art lab,TIFAC CORE lab at PSG TECH

text: 8:55 AM - Students should assemble at allotted Hall.
